name: Cat Friend Generator
description:
A little generator I originally made in a week for the Games Made Quick?? jam!

Click the button to generate a little cat friend for yourself! Or, if you feel so inclined, create one in the 'Creator Mode'!

This generator should be compatible with most mobile devices; if you encounter any issues with mobile compatibility (specially with font size), please let me know and I'll do my best to fix it when I can!

Also, leave suggestions of names for the cats! I'd love to add more names, specially if they're silly! 

Description & Thoughts

I had so much fun making this! I've been trying to learn Javascript and this is the first project of mine that I've ever written entirely on my own without an engine. It's very simple but writing all the HTML / CSS / Javascript by hand was so much for my goblin brain. My brain is now scrampled egg.

I'm sorry in advance if you find any glitches or anything like that! Please let me know if you do and I'll try to fix them when I can.

Also, there are like three different trans flag scarves and it's 100% my fault for adding all three on accident instead of picking one. I have one brain cell. I decided against changing that, however, and I'm just keeping it now.

Art and programming by me! 

Fonts used in the game are Cute Written and Arrows!
